column2: SOUTH DAKOTA DMV PERMIT PRACTICE TEST
Question Text
1. This sign means:
column4: Business area nearby. Watch for business people.
column6: The driver is near a school and should watch for children.
column8: There is a work zone ahead. Watch for workers.

column2: 2. Bicyclists making a left hand turn:
column8: should wait on the right side of the road.

column2: 3. At intersections marked with stop lines, drivers must:
column4: slow down and enter the intersection.

column2: 4. A diamond-shaped sign is a:
5. ___________ are green with white letters and symbols.
6. This sign indicates the _______________ vehicles can safely travel in this area.
7. The first thing affected after drinking alcohol is:
8. As you drive on the expressway, make sure:
column6: you cut off vehicles behind you when you change lanes.
column8: your directional signal goes off before you change lanes.

column2: 9. A flashing yellow light:
column4: warns drivers to proceed with caution.

column2: 10. This sign means:
11. What should you do as you prepare to turn right at an intersection?
column4: Yield to bicyclists coming from the opposite direction.
column8: Signal your turn, check for bicyclists, and do not turn directly in front of a bicyclist.

column2: 12. When the road is slippery, you should:
column4: press your brakes in slow, steady strokes.

column2: 13. When a pedestrian is crossing a street guided carrying a white cane, drivers must:
column4: help the pedestrian cross the street.
column6: yield the right of way at corners only.

column2: 14. If an intersection has crosswalk lines but no STOP line, where must you stop for a red light?
15. Just like alcohol and other drugs, drowsiness can:
column6: help you to be a better driver.

column2: 16. You are considered to be driving under the influence when your blood alcohol concentration (BAC) is ____ or more.
17. Your BAC depends on:
column6: how much time passes between drinks.

column2: 18. This sign means:
column4: You can only park between 8:30 AM and 5:30 PM.
column6: Parking is not allowed at 8:30 AM and at 5:30 PM
column8: No parking between 8:30 AM and 5:30 PM.

column2: 19. The yield sign is ___ and white, with ___ letters.
20. Two drivers reach an uncontrolled intersection at the same time. Who has the right of way?
21. This sign indicates:
22. BAC is:
column4: the percentage of alcohol in your blood.
column8: the number of ounces of alcohol in your blood.

column2: 23. What should drivers do when they see this road sign?
column4: come to a complete stop and wait for a train to cross.
column6: slow down, look for a train, and be prepared to stop.

column2: 24. Does a vehicle prepared to enter a traffic circle or rotary have right-of-way over vehicles in the circle?
column4: Yes, but only if they are entering the rotary from the right lane.
column8: No. Vehicles already in the circle have the right-of-way.

column2: 25. An octagonal sign means that drivers must:
column8: come to a complete stop at the marked stop line.
